sentences.english: He used to bathe in the sea after supper.
sentences.chinese: 晚飯後，他經常去海中泡水取涼。

sentences.english: In the geothermal system of running water, floor water waste.

sentences.english: He used to bathe in the river after supper.
sentences.chinese: 晚飯後，他經常去河中泡水取涼。

sentences.english: An American tourist in London was desperate to take a leak.
sentences.chinese: 一個美國的遊客來到倫敦，他非常焦急地想要放泡水。

sentences.english: To clamp the electric wire is a appropriate design to prevent being wet or pulled off.
sentences.chinese: 電線附裝夾具，以防止泡水及拉掉之貼心設計。
